item.TYPESRC: BEGIN OF ty_s_data, badge TYPE pa0032-wausw, * pwd TYPE pa0105-usrid, pernr TYPE persno, name TYPE emnam, tipo_record TYPE zpp_tipo_rec, progr TYPE zpp_progr, rueck TYPE afvc-rueck, rmzhl TYPE co_rmzhl, aufnr TYPE caufv-aufnr, vornr TYPE zpp_vornr, werks TYPE werks_d, isdd TYPE isdd, isdz TYPE ru_isdz, iedd TYPE iedd, iedz TYPE ru_iedz, ism01 TYPE zpp_ismng, ile01 TYPE co_ismngeh, event TYPE zpp_event, yield TYPE ru_lmnga, scrap TYPE ru_xmnga, budat TYPE afru-budat, grund TYPE zpp_causale, nota TYPE co_rtext, msg_id TYPE string, esito TYPE zdbc_esito, descr_esito TYPE zdbc_descr_esito, arbpl TYPE arbpl, n_nesting TYPE zeppp_nesting, END OF ty_s_data
